root.message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 5-a-2, translated into en
root.data: This is a qualitative, legal indicator. Upon submission of the reporting questionnaire by the focal point in the responsible institution, the Land Rights team performs a quality assessment on the basis of the methodological guidelines. This ensures that the reporting is carried out consistently across all reporting countries. During this quality review, the FAO Land Rights team may provide methodological clarifications to ensure conformity with the methodological guidelines.
